Production Co: Lost Lane Entertainment, Brookstreet Pictures, Come What May Productions, PaperChase Films, A24, The Searchers NV, TUGAWOOD Pictures, Sight Unseen Pictures, Maven Pictures, Hua Wen Movie Group, Code Entertainment, Item 7

Synopsis: A young man makes the dangerous choice to leave the white supremacist gang he joined as a teenager. With his former friends against him, he is determined to create a new life for himself -- if he can make it out alive.
Title: Skin
